Legacy Document

Important: The information in this document is obsolete and should not be used for new development.

Inside Macintosh:

Documentation Updates for OpenDoc 1.1

This document lists the revisions that have been made to the online versions of the books in the OpenDoc documentation suite for OpenDoc version 1.1. Changes have been made to the OpenDoc Programmer's Guide and the OpenDoc Class Reference, provided in Acrobat, HTML, and QuickView formats. The printed versions of these books have not been revised. The OpenDoc Cookbook has not been revised.

The descriptions of the revisions listed below contain live links to the changed passages in the documents; click on the cross-reference page numbers to open the revised page.

Update Contents
Changes to the OpenDoc Programmer's Guide
Changes to the OpenDoc Class Reference
